title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Search for references to this field.
OB: When searching for references to the field, the search results are not selected in the external jar.
EB: You should get 3 matches in the method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the software.
2. Perform a search for references to the field.
3. Check if the search results are selected in the external jar.
4. Observe that the search results are not selected.
